name: SSF9
title: Site-Specific Factor 9
subtitle: Other Connective Tissue Disease
notes:
**Note:**   Code history of connective tissue disease other than rheumatoid arthritis, Sjogren syndrome, and sicca syndrome as documented by the physician or coded in the medical record.  Connective tissue diseases fall within **Chapter 13 of ICD-10-CM, "Diseases of the musculoskeletal system and connective tissue (M00-M99), pgs. 574-771**". 
* Examples include: systemic lupus erythematosus, scleroderma, dermatomyositis, and polymyositis
rows: No history of connective tissue disease
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
